name: Starlot Derby
description:
The Supreme Arcade Baseball Experience Debuts!

Smash your way to Intergalactic peace by getting the most home runs on the planet!

★Features★

★Endlessly slick baseball in vibrant HD.
★4 Easy to play and difficult to master league difficulties.
★Fever Mode throws a change up with Pong, Breakout, and Space Invaders!
★Major Mode keeps it real with only the truest Homerun action!
★Real Baseball Stats that track how you are playing!
★Become the best slugger in the world with 11 Global Leaderboards!
★14 Achievements to collect!
★21+ equippable cards for your Bat, Ball, and Field! Collect them all!
★Baseball all year round with Seasonal updates and 6-12 new Cosmetics!

★Available in 6 languages!

A Maximum Crash Joint by Rejon Taylor-Foster

Twitter: @Maximum_Crash

Tumblr: maximumcrash.tumblr.com

Please donate if you can. All proceeds go to development and food.

★Fun Fact: The Starmen and Starwomen are a proxy race that represent each other and can love whoever they please.
